issues.message: Field "hiddenPanel" is always hidden and increases DOM size unnecessarily.
issues.recommendation: Consider removing this field from the form and storing this as form variable. Hidden fields that are never shown bloat the DOM and impact performance.

issues.message: Circular dependency detected: fieldA → fieldA → fieldB → fieldC
issues.recommendation: Break the circular dependency by removing or modifying one of the rules. Circular dependencies can cause infinite loops and performance issues. Consider using events or consolidating the logic.

issues.message: Custom function "validateUserName" accesses the DOM. Custom functions should not manipulate the DOM directly.
issues.recommendation: Remove DOM access from custom functions. Use form data model and rules engine for UI updates. DOM manipulations should be handled in custom component, not custom functions.

issues.message: CSS background-image detected: "images/hero.jpg". Consider using Image component instead.
issues.recommendation: Replace with <Image> component for better lazy loading, responsive images, and automatic optimization. Background images cannot be lazy loaded and impact form rendering performance.

issues.message: CSS background-image detected: "/assets/card-bg.png". Consider using Image component instead.
issues.recommendation: Replace with <Image> component for better lazy loading, responsive images, and automatic optimization. Background images cannot be lazy loaded and impact form rendering performance.

issues.recommendation: Use BEM or utility classes to reduce selector depth. Deep selectors slow down CSS matching in forms with many elements.

issues.message: @import blocks rendering: "theme.css"
issues.recommendation: Replace @import with <link> tags or bundle CSS files. @import forces sequential loading and delays form rendering.
